thread.title: Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil: Ahaana to die?
thread.title_full: Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil: Ahaana to die?

title: Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil: Ahaana to die?
text:
Feedback 
Things are about to take a tragic turn on the popular show Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil. Adaa Khan's character (Ahaana) will be killed off in an upcoming episode of the show. Yes, you read that right, this is really going to happen. We wonder how will Naina react to the news of Ahaana's death since she was the only one who knew about Naina's surrogacy. Poor Naina and Raghav, trouble and the couple just go together. 
"We have been giggling all day in between shots. Adaa and I have been friends for a while and it is so refreshing to have her join us on the show bringing in some new twists and turns," the show's lead Raghav aka Arjun Bijlani had earlier said in a statement. Watch Right Now
